name: Codespace to bootstrap valet in a Codespace
postCreateCommand: docker login ghcr.io/valet-customers --username ${GITHUB_USER} --password ${VALET_PASSWORD} && docker pull ghcr.io/valet-customers/valet-cli:latest && pwsh ./azure_devops/bootstrap/updateEnvs.ps1 -ghPAT ${VALET_PASSWORD} -azdoPAT ${AZDO_TOKEN} -org ${AZDO_ORG} -proj ${AZDO_PROJECT} || echo 'Could not auto-build. Skipping.'
